Introduction
Iuri Baseia currently works at the Department of Botany and Zoology (DBEZ), Federal University of Rio Grande do Norte (UFRN), Brazil. Iuri does research in Systematics of gasteroid Fungi (Basidiomycota). Their current project is 'Integrative taxonomy of gasteroid Fungi with emphasis on puffballs, earthballs, stinkhorns, cage fungi, earthstars and bird's nest fungi'. CV: http://lattes.cnpq.br/1260730935714266

Taxonomy and phylogeny of gasteroid fungi (Basidiomycota) with emphasis on Lycoperdaceae
Project
This project aims to review the collections of gasteroid fungi focused on tropical species. They are being made morphological and molecular studies, especially with type collections. The genera in focus are: Lycoperdon, Bovista and Calvatia. Besides being made revisions of other gasteroid groups as: Myriostoma, Geastrum, Cyathus, Phallus, Clathrus, Xylophallus and Blumenavia, including hypogeous taxa (Projeto Pesquisador Visitante Especial do Programa Ciencia sem Fronteiras.
